attributes.action: Get a refund of the £400k spent on the 2012 logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 2012 Olympics is already shaping up to be a costly sham.  These games never make the money they're supposed to for the host city.  Now to add insult to injury, the so-called logo which is meant to inspire the world is unvieled, and that too falls short of it's promise.  It was no doubt sent for approval several times during development, surely someone must have thought "I could get a four year old to do that for free".  I don't want to pay for that rubbish, and hopefully a large number of you won't either.  Please sign up, and get your friends and family to as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
